title: Amazing
review: Visual effects are amazing. Excellent drama. Very realistic and very well directed by Damien. It's one of the best movies of this year.

title: Perfection
review: A masterpiece. Excellent script, acting and shots from the director. Definitely you can call it a flawless movie.

title: All time favorite
review: Excellent director and writer= excellent film. Once again the Nolan brothers delivered us a masterpiece. From the fisics theories to sci fi, adventure and drama. An epic soundtrack from Hanz Zimmer. Visual effects are incredible.

title: Spectacular Film
review: Spirited Away is for sure the best animated film of all time. Is perfect in animation, story and original score.

title: One of the best of 2019
review: Excellent writing, acting, direction, drama, suspense and action. A must see this year.

title: I had to see it twice.
review: Definitely the best movie of 2019. Everybody who loves cinema must see this film.

title: Movie of the year
review: The suspense, drama, accuracy with the real life, visually amazing. It's just beautiful.
